snippet: Warren E. Buffett wrote in a letter that the disease was in Stage 1 and that he had been told by doctors that it was "not remotely life-threatening or even debilitating in any meaningful way."
abstract: Warren E. Buffett wrote in a letter that the disease was in Stage 1 and that he had been told by doctors that it was "not remotely life-threatening or even debilitating in any meaningful way."

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Revealing Prostate Cancer, Buffett Plays Down Effect
headline.print_headline: Revealing Prostate Cancer, Buffett Plays Down Effect
